moves.1. d4: Van Mil aims for a slower, positional game. 1 P-K4 is the move for a fast, tactical affair.
moves.1... Nf6: Instead of a Classical response, Witt opens with an Indian defense.
moves.2... e6: To prevent the center being completely overrun.
moves.3. Nc3: Developing and supporting the Q-side push.
moves.4. g3: Presumably intending to fianchetto the KB.
moves.5. Nf3: Adding a guard to the QP.
